channel.title: Feature Idea: Abbreviation tooltips
channel.description:
With all the abbreviations floating around it might be useful to have support for abbreviation explanation tooltips—especially for new users. Kind of like the list in the Gauntlet Jargon document.
Example: <abbr title="Dungeon World">DW</abbr>
I know this can be done by manually using the `<abbr>` tag but I saw that there's a relevant [discourse plugin](https://meta.discourse.org/t/add-abbr-tags-to-words-in-posts/88394) which makes it more user-friendly. I'm not sure about the quality of the plugin and how you feel about installing plugins, but I thought I would throw the idea over your way :smile:
